plain_text:
United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit


No. 06-1860

                         ABRAHAM PHILIP,

                      Plaintiff, Appellant,

                               v.

                          JOHN CRONIN,

                      Defendant, Appellee.


                          ERRATA SHEET

     The opinion of this Court issued on August 7, 2008 is
amended as follows:

     On page 17, footnote 3, line 2, delete the stray equals
sign.
